results.title: Hypoglycemic encephalopathy caused by overdose of metformin in an adolescent
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@Hypoglycemic encephalopathy@@@ caused by @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in an adolescent

results.title: Hypoglycemic effect of the fruit extracts of two varieties of Rubus rosifolius.
results.text_hl: In its oxidized state compound 1 produced a significant @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@hypoglycemic@@@ effect which was more effective than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for the first 30 min of the assay (p = .03) and not significantly different for up to 120 min.

citations.NLM: Rambaran TF, Nembhard N, Bowen-Forbes CS, Alexander-Lindo RL. Hypoglycemic effect of the fruit extracts of two varieties of Rubus rosifolius. J Food Biochem. 2020 Sep;44(9):e13365. PMID: 32638412

results.title: Design, synthesis and evaluation of tetrahydrocarbazole derivatives as potential hypoglycemic agents.
results.text_hl: Aza-tetrahydrocarbazole compound 12b showed the most potent @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@hypoglycemic@@@ activity with a 45% increase in @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ consumption when compared to the solvent control, which had approximately 1.2-fold higher activity than the positive control compounds (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and ZG02).

citations.NLM: Wang LL, Du Y, Li SM, Cheng F, Zhang NN, Chen R, Cui X, Yang SG, Fan LL, Wang JT, Guo B, Wu HS, Zhang JQ, Tang L. Design, synthesis and evaluation of tetrahydrocarbazole derivatives as potential hypoglycemic agents. Bioorg Chem. 2021 Oct;115():105172. PMID: 34303898

results.title: Effects of Capsaicin on the Hypoglycemic Regulation of Metformin and Gut Microbiota Profiles in Type 2 Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to investigate whether @CHEMICAL_Capsaicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002211 @@@CAP@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@hypoglycemic@@@ effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ is pertinent to gut microbiota.

results.title: [Cost-utility study of the combination of metformin with the different glucose-lowering medication classes in adults 80 aged and older].
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The lower @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@hypoglycemic@@@ strategies are @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformine@@@+DPP-4 inhibitor and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@+@GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@GLP-1@@@ analogs.

results.title: Effect of metformin in hypothalamic astrocytes from an immunocompromised mice model.
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can mediate glioprotection due its effects on age-related disorders in non-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@diabetic encephalopathy@@@ individuals.

results.title: The Effectiveness and Safety of Metformin Compared to Sulfonylureas in Diabetic Nephropathy: A Systematic Review
results.text_hl: All studies reported adjusted hazard ratios with confidence limits. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was found to be more effective in the following events: all-cause mortality, GFR (glomerular filtration rate), @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@ESRD@@@ (@DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@end-stage renal disease@@@) or @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ events, one-year risk of @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ or @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@end-stage renal disease@@@, cardiovascular events, @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ hospitalization, and @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@hypoglycemic@@@ episodes.

citations.NLM: Boddepalli CS, Gutlapalli SD, Lavu VK, Abdelwahab Mohamed Abdelwahab R, Huang R, Potla S, Bhalla S, AlQabandi Y, Nandula SA, Khan S. The Effectiveness and Safety of Metformin Compared to Sulfonylureas in Diabetic Nephropathy: A Systematic Review Cureus. 2022 Dec;14(12):e32286. PMID: 36628027

results.title: Metformin for gestational diabetes study: metformin vs insulin in gestational diabetes: glycemic control and obstetrical and perinatal outcomes: randomized prospective trial.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@Hypoglycemic@@@ episodes were significantly more common in the @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@-treated group (55.9% vs 17.7% on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@; odds ratio, 6.118; 95% confidence interval, 3.134-11.944; P=.000).

results.title: The Risk Factors of Severe Hypoglycemia in Older Patients with Dementia and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ who suffered from a @<m>DISEASE_hypoglycemic_encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000721848 @@@hypoglycemic@@@ event received a lower percentage of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ than those who did not (p < 0.001) (Table 2).
